title: Lvl up capsule not added in loot
body: it happened several times now. i'm pissed off i do not gain loot for levelling up. The pop up come out "you lvld up and got a capsule" but then when i go to loot section the capsule wont show. plz fix, i've already send several tickets but noone replay me. thanx

replies.body: Hey I looked into this for you and don't see anything out of the ordinary.  It looks like you received loot for your level 40 milestone as well as 41.  You received shards for Kalista, Thresh, Taric, Nidalee, and a Legend emote.  Let me know if that clears things up, and grats!
